price: 他们以廉价——可数的几个银币——出卖了他，他们是不怜惜他的。
arabic: وَشَرَوۡهُ بِثَمَنِۭ بَخۡسٖ دَرَٰهِمَ مَعۡدُودَةٖ وَكَانُواْ فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلزَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: washarawhu bithamanin bakhsin darāhima maʿdūdatin wakānū fīhi mina al-zāhidīna
